text: Anyone with an opinion regarding what to serialise `TypedTables` as for long-term reliable storage? I originally planned for CSV, but I lose some type information that way.

elements.text: Anyone with an opinion regarding what to serialise
as for long-term reliable storage? I originally planned for CSV, but I lose some type information that way.

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
JLD2 perhaps?  tagging <@U9769MVA7> for help on this :sweat_smile:

Arrow format (<https://github.com/JuliaData/Arrow.jl|https://github.com/JuliaData/Arrow.jl>) should preserve type information and be very fast for tables. I think it's reliable for long-term storage, but it's probably better to double check this with the devs
